languages.text: "Ризза, те силы, что ты в себя впустила, погубят не только тебя. Твоя команда поплатится за них своими душами. По твоей вине".
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."
languages.original_text: "Ризза, те силы, что ты в себя впустила, погубят не только тебя. Твоя команда поплатится за них своими душами. По твоей вине".

traits.locale_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for that with their souls. Because of you."
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for that with their souls. Because of you."
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for that with their souls. Because of you."
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for that with their souls. Because of you."
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."
"Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

languages.text: “莱萨，你侍奉的力量会让你万劫不复。更糟糕的是，你的船员也会为此付出灵魂的代价，这都是你的错。”
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

traits.locale_text: “莱萨，你侍奉的力量会让你万劫不复。更糟糕的是，你的船员也会为此付出灵魂的代价，这都是你的错。”

languages.text: 「リザ、お前が自分で開放した力は、お前自身の破滅を招くだろう。その上、お前の仲間も魂でその代償を払うことになる。すべてお前のせいだ」
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

traits.locale_text: 「リザ、お前が自分で開放した力は、お前自身の破滅を招くだろう。その上、お前の仲間も魂でその代償を払うことになる。すべてお前のせいだ」

languages.text: «Las fuerzas a las que se ha abierto serán su perdición, Ryzza. Y lo que es peor, su tripulación también lo pagará con sus almas. Por su culpa».
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

traits.locale_text: «Las fuerzas a las que se ha abierto serán su perdición, Ryzza. Y lo que es peor, su tripulación también lo pagará con sus almas. Por su culpa».

languages.text: "Ryzza, die Mächte, denen Ihr Euch geöffnet habt, werden Euer Untergang sein. Und auch Eure Crew wird dafür mit ihren Seelen bezahlen. Euretwegen."
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

traits.locale_text: "Ryzza, die Mächte, denen Ihr Euch geöffnet habt, werden Euer Untergang sein. Und auch Eure Crew wird dafür mit ihren Seelen bezahlen. Euretwegen."

languages.text: « Ryzza, les forces auxquelles vous vous êtes livrée vous mèneront à votre perte. Les membres de votre équipage le paieront eux aussi de leur âme, par votre faute. »
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."

traits.locale_text: « Ryzza, les forces auxquelles vous vous êtes livrée vous mèneront à votre perte. Les membres de votre équipage le paieront eux aussi de leur âme, par votre faute. »

languages.text: "Ryzza, teslim olduğun irade senin sonunu getirecek. Üstelik bu yaptığın, tayfanın da ruhlarına mal olacak. Mesuliyet senin."
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, the forces you have opened yourself up to will be your undoing. And what's more, your crew, too, will pay for it with their souls. Because of you."
